description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Layout' that structures the main layout of a web application, featuring a sidebar navigation, top bar, and main content area. It manages user information display and handles logout functionality.

methods.name: Layout({ children, title, subtitle })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the application's layout with sidebar and topbar, accepting props for page content, title, and subtitle.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout by invoking signOut, then navigating to the login page.

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Layout({ children, title, subtitle }) {$/
